document_data.name: Ravilar's Cloak
document_data.mainbody: '''Ravilar's Cloak''', also known as '''The Cloak''', was a wild and rowdy mining town within the [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.Geography: The settlement was located in the foothills of the [[Orsraun Mountains]] in [[Turmish]].
document_data.Defense: As a hot-spot for treasure seekers, the town was rough and rowdy. The Cloak was protected by [[warrior]]s from all the independent mining groups within the community.
document_data.History:
Around [[1270 DR]], a [[ranger]] known as [[Antonio Ravilar]] protected the small community of miners from a band of [[bugbear]]s.

Over the years, the town became known for its murders, such as in [[1363 DR]], when a merchant [[Alataz Thrindol]] from [[Telflamm]] turned up missing. In [[1370 DR]], a bag of [[emerald]]s worth 60,000 [[gp]] was found in a cesspool and a [[Calishite]] [[thief]], [[Rastar|Rastar of the Blades]], took up residence in the merchant's manor.
document_data.Legends: Ravilar's Cloak was said to be haunted by ''[[the flying helm]]''. The inhabitants blamed the magical helm for anything that went missing.
